name: change_phase
description: This function is called in every run operation. The purpose of this function is to send the current phase of conversation in the function parameters. This function returns a number. If the number returned is same as the current phase, keep proceeding the coversation. If the returned number is different from the current phase, change the phase of conversation swiftly

phase.description: This is a number identifying the current phase of conversation

interestInService.description: This determines if the user is interested in trendshub service or not. This parameter is typically collected in phase 1 of conversation

interestInApp.description: This determines if the user is interested in installing trendshub app or not. This parameter is typically collected in phase 3 of conversation
